channel.title: JavaScript on Travis Green
channel.description: Recent content in JavaScript on Travis Green

item.title: Added Docker Build Status Badge to shields.io
item.description: Shields.io is a massive library of badges that can be inserted into project README’s or websites displaying various statuses (code coverage, health, version, etc).Â Support for docker was missing the current build health, and was a pretty trivial addition.

item.title: O. React Pomodoro Timer
item.description: A timer with customizable parameters for work time and break time. Implemented in 3 ways: as a single page stateful REACT app, a stateful app divided into parent & child classes, and an app made of functional components using hooks. What Is the Pomodoro Technique? Using this method, you break your workday into 25-minute chunks separated by five-minute breaks. These intervals are referred to as pomodoros. Every time the clock runs out, the timer automatically resets and switches to work/break session.
